resources.string: You can reach me under the following:

Highly motived and result orriented software programer that can help to improve organization productivity and helps to organization achieve their goals. Be able to work under the pressure even though, project has limited time schedule.Always try to up-to-date computer knowledge is my favourite principle that giving new technogical ideas to the organization, keep up to organization todays technology.Can be able to work with team projects and very fast oriention capability I have . Also widely open productivity feed-backs from my colleagues. Full stack development is welcome and addition I completed projects without any failure ,also I would like to use design patterns in the projects which provide to companies fast and successfully deliver software or software packages.|

CANER SARIGUL - SOFTWARE DEVELOPER 
 High-level understanding of Software Development Architecture, Software Engineering, Mobile Software Development and Software Lifecycle Management, Reverse Engineering in conjunction with proactive coordination, multitasking, and problem solving skills Technically sophisticated, multifaceted, and intuitive software developer offering progressive experience overseeing the development and release of applications/software, including coordinating the creation of complex revenue-generating applications/products. Adept at building front-end user interfaces and designing/redesigning interactive and user-friendly software, taking into consideration client needs, functionality, latest technological innovations, and programming standards. Top performer with experience JavaScript, HTML5, Native Android Development and C# Unity Scripting, Bug fixes, software optimization solutions and working closely with developers, clients, stakeholders, end users, and other employees 

 EDUCATION BACKGROUND 
 Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering, İstanbul Kültür University, İstanbul, Turkey (Jun 2013) Master Program e-MBA, İstanbul Bilgi University, İstanbul, Turkey (September 2016 -Current) 

 TECHNOLOGY PROFICIENCY

 JavaScript | C# Scripting for Unity|HTML |Android Development
